means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 威瑟来源于古诺斯语，含义是“广阔的+信使”(wide+messenger)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词都有"凋谢"之意。
means: fade ： 侧重指渐渐失去色彩和光泽。
wither ： 指因无活力而丧失生命力。

sentence.Network_en: To see my body literally wither away before my eyes was exasperating.
sentence.Network_cn: 眼见自己的身体日渐衰弱真是让人心烦。
岁月并未使她的容颜减色.

sentence.Network_en: As the leaves of autumn wither and fall, so has my own life become barren.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的生命就如秋叶般枯萎凋零。

jx.jx_en_mean: fail to be implemented or dealt with because of neglect or inaction
jx.jx_cn_mean: （因疏忽、无行动而）未贯彻；未处理

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: apparently a variant of weather, ultimately differentiated for certain senses

entry.def: If someone or something withers, they become very weak.

example.ex: When he went into retirement, he visibly withered...
example.tran: 他到退休年龄时已老态毕现。

example.ex: Industries unable to modernize have been left to wither.
example.tran: 无法实现现代化的行业已经自行衰落。

entry.def: If a flower or plant withers, it dries up and dies.

example.ex: The flowers in Isabel's room had withered...
example.tran: 伊莎贝尔房间里的花已经枯萎了。

example.ex: Farmers in the Midwest have watched their crops wither because of drought conditions.
example.tran: 美国中西部农民眼睁睁地看着他们的庄稼旱死。

entry.def: The highest part of a horse's back, behind its neck, is referred to as its withers .

means.word_mean: 1. wither, especially with a loss of moisture;

auth_sentence.content: Our businesses, our livelihoods wither as we watch.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our businesses, our livelihoods wither as we watch.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our businesses, our livelihoods wither as we watch.

auth_sentence.content: The field Strewn with...yellow drifts Of wither'd leaves.
auth_sentence.res_content: The field Strewn with...yellow drifts Of wither'd leaves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The field Strewn with...yellow drifts Of wither'd leaves.

auth_sentence.content: But we are letting British English wither.
auth_sentence.res_content: But we are letting British English wither.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But we are letting British English wither.

sentences.en: The grass withered because there was no water.
The hot sun had withered all my plants.
sentences.cn: 烈日晒得我的所有植物都枯萎了。

jushi.english: The grass withered because there was no water.

jushi.chinese: 烈日晒得我的所有植物都枯萎了。
